Dannevirke Town Hall to host new Tararua District Council chambers; council says move will save ratepayers $91,000 a year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/dannevirke-town-hall-to-host-new-tararua-district-council-chambers-council-says-the-move-will- save-ratepayers-91000-a-year/B6HFNBMEANGE5MS7QDSE53OV4Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/dannevirke-town-hall-to-host-new-tararua-district-council-chambers-council-says-the-move-will- save-ratepayers-91000-a-year/B6HFNBMEANGE5MS7QDSE53OV4Y/ Michaela GowerTCC is relocating its chambers to Dannevirke Town Hall to save ratepayers money.
